Name: War for Magincia
About the game: In this prequel to Swamp Castle and the Great Tournament, lead a medieval faction as it attempts to secure the Kingdom of Magincia. Deal with other hostile factions and fight off barbarians to secure your rule. Use diplomacy, war, or intrigue to defeat your rival factions Randomly generated events and stats result in new game each time you play. Work for the betterment of the Kingdom and people, or take all its riches for yourself. Send diplomats to rival factions to sue for peace or spies to cause chaos and war among your rivals. Train your army with a variety of unit troops. Upgrade their equipment and training. Choose your general and level him/her up with a variety of military maneuvers. Hire advisors to help in your quest to secure the Kingdom of Magincia. Deep story tree results in many different endings. Play the game on easy, normal, or hard. Unlock achievements and new modes of play.
